step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Try to keep your shoulder relaxed and your arm reaching up as much as possible.
Excellent! You're doing a good job of opening your hand wide. Focus on a full stretch of your fingers.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles. Ensure you are taking a full breath in during this step.
Fantastic! You're opening your hand and relaxing well on the exhale. Keep visualizing that fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm up high and open your hand wide. Squeeze into a fist as you breathe in, then relax as you breathe out. Keep up the good work!
